In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?
In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. There is a lot demand for healthcare services and the supply is less. There are many number of people who are getting affected with different of diseases and are not able to get healthcare services on time. There are many villages in which there is no proper healthcare services.

Now-a-days medicines are discovered for many deadly diseases, but many of them are not aware of the medicines discovered and are also not able to get the medicine to them.

There is cure for cancer but many of them are not aware of this. So many people are getting affected with cancer and becoming victims of it.

There are many government hospitals which run for name-sake. There is no proper treatment to the patients. Reasons may be many like lack of proper facility, lack of medicines, lack of doctors, doctors negligence etc..

Many people in the country are dying due to lack of proper healthcare services. So, government should take neccesary steps to improve patient care in the country.

I think healthcare can be improved by taking the following steps. They are as follows

Government should give strict rules to hospitals to provide proper healthcare services to the patients, and every activity of the hospitals should be recorded in system.

Government should conduct awareness session to the people regarding the diseases which are very dangerous and also provide sessions on health care that need to be taken by them.

Government should pass strict rules to the government hospitals that every employee should complete their shift timings as per the scheduled shift rather than coming leisurely at whatever time they want, as many of the poor people who depend on government hospitals are not able to get proper medicines as the treatment is given by the nurse or compounder of that hospital due to the absence of doctor.

Government should provide mobile healthcare services so that patients get treatment at areas in which they are located.

Government should make sure that all the medicines reach to the government hospitals. As there are cases where corrupt doctors sell them to others.

As the population is increasing very much government is not in a situation to provide medicines to all of them. So goverment should provide free family planning services to the people.

If the population is in control, government can provide healthcare services to almost all the people.

If the government can provide some awareness to people regarding the diseases, atleast few of them can be saved from diseases.

Government should provide healthcamp twice in every month to rural areas so that services are provided to rural people also.

Strict Invigilation shoud be done in hospitals to check if proper treatment is provided and proper medicines are given.

If government takes some steps gap between healthcare supply and demand can be reduced.
